header.name: Mountain Abbey of Terror
header.author: Watabou Generator
header.description: The abbey is situated deep in the salt marshes, protected by the dangerous local fauna and impassable terrain. These days it is overrun with bears.

rooms.name: room_1
rooms.description: A rear entrance into the abbey.

rooms.name: room_2
rooms.description: A potion of resistence among rubble on the ground.

rooms.name: room_3
rooms.description: An ogre. Pleads to borrow candles.

rooms.name: room_4
rooms.description: A great door with a keyhole on the southern wall.

rooms.name: room_5
rooms.description: A chest holds a palm-shaped key.

rooms.name: room_6
rooms.description: A staff of power hovering in the middle of the hall.

rooms.name: room_12
rooms.description: A bottomless pit, sounds the alarm if a coin is dropped into it.

rooms.name: room_7
rooms.description: A wall panel conceals a shield and some gold.

rooms.name: room_8
rooms.description: A carving on the wall, totally destroyed by ogre vandals.

rooms.name: room_9
rooms.description: A monk, sleeping in a corner.

rooms.name: room_10
rooms.description: A writing on the floor: DEATH TO OGRES
